#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
bool prime[1000001];
int cnt[1000001];
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	memset(prime, true, sizeof(prime));
	for (int p=2; p*p<=1000000; p++)
    {
        if (prime[p] == true)
        {
            for (int i=p*2; i<=1000000; i += p)
                prime[i] = false;
        }
    }
    cnt[0] = 0;
    for (int p=1;p<1000001;p++){
        if(prime[p]){
            cnt[p] = cnt[p-1] + 1;
        }
        else{
            cnt[p] = cnt[p-1];
        }
    }
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
	    int x,y;
	    cin>>x>>y;
	    cout<<cnt[y] - cnt[x-1]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
